regen.absent_element: notification when manual setting overrides scheduled setting
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user when a manual temperature setting overrides a scheduled setting.

regen.absent_element: saving or storing of the scheduled settings
regen.new_specification: The system shall store the scheduled settings for each thermostat to ensure persistence across power cycles or system restarts.
The system shall automatically revert to the default temperature setting when the scheduled or manually set time period ends for each thermostat.

label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
